page.title: 10RECREATION
page.content: {Burnopfield Community Association. Activities include:Bingo,Over 60's, Carpet Bowls,Whist,Dancing,W.I.,Ladies Club,Yoga,Luncheon Club,Lapidary,Slim and Trim Class,Roller Disco,Mother and Toddler Club. The Park is in Birch Crescent and it has one bowling green,two tennis courts and one putting green. There are several clubs in the area.There are two cricket teams in Burnopfield,with intense rivalry between them,two football clubs,a bowling club,a club for pigeon fanciers and a local golf club at the Hobson run bvy Derwentside District Council,the Local Authority. There are numerous walks in the area,the most notable being The derwent Walk which runs through the valley to the North.
